title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Reaching out to others in a discreet manner might encourage them to open up and share their stories. You may be frustrated with the lack of productivity at work now, but sympathizing with a coworker could de-escalate the tension better than telling them off. The root of a colleagues declining performance is likely an emotionally personal issue. The conversational sextile between the chatty Gemini Moon and healing Chiron suggests that you dont need to show up with all the answers. Sometimes, people just want to know someone cares about their wellbeing. You surely can be that flicker of light for a soul in a dark place. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
